dashboard.description: Visualization of the Component and Integration Promotion Pipelines

panels.description: List of the latest failing integration / promotion  jobs.

targets.query: SELECT "log_link", "duration", "result" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "pipeline" =~ /periodic/ AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /wallaby/) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Wallaby failing periodic jobs

targets.query: select   "component",  "repo_url", "consistent_date", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'baremetal' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'cinder' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'compute' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'manila' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'network' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'octavia' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'security' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date", last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'swift' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'tempest' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'tripleo' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'ui' )

select   "component",  "repo_url",  "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'wallaby' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8'  and "component" = 'validation' )

panels.title: Wallaby Components: Days since last promotion

styles.linkTooltip: link to the results of each job

targets.query: SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'master' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'victoria' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'ussuri' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'train' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'train' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'stein' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'rocky' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'queens' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

panels.title: RDO promotions

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo-rdo for wallaby. Default time is the last 2 weeks.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'wallaby' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-8 Wallaby RDO ( current-tripleo-rdo )

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, "consistent_date",  last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'stein' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

SELECT release, distro, promotion_details, "consistent_date", last("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'rocky' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-7') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY release, "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Train CentOS-8 Components: Days since last promotion

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for ussuri.

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'train' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for train.

targets.query: SELECT "log_link", "duration", "result" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "pipeline" =~ /periodic/ AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /train/) AND $timeFilter
